attributes.title: Worst app ever😭🤬🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app has the quality of a one starred, candy crush wannabe game that not even 3 year olds would play. The format is horrible and disorganized and I’m disappointed that it was made that way... I really thought bunker boy’s team would at least try to make a new app. 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮never download this it gives your phone a virus and steals alll your info. 😧🤮🤮🤮it LITERALLY made me sick. Never ever download this ever.....

attributes.title: so amazing.....ly horrible 🧚🏼‍♂️✨💖
attributes.review: It destroyed my phone and my will to live

attributes.title: Ewwww
attributes.review: I could smell how bad the app was through the screen.

attributes.title: So homo
attributes.review: I did not like this app I am literally going through a depression after seeing this my need water and milk because this is so bad I’d rather have cancer

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try to like our president. All I saw was Trump being racist, homophobic, xenophobic, and much more. His team is just as terrible as he is. I am disgusted with apple for having an app like this in their AppStore. ALSO, my phone was glitching the second I downloaded the app. Pictures of DONALD J TRUMP we’re popping up constantly which caused me to go completely blind in my right eye. You heard me COMPLETELY BLIND and now I will never be able to see my family ever again.

attributes.title: Something strange
attributes.review: 0/10 would not recommend. Once I downloaded I constantly kept shouting “MAGA MAGA MAGA” over and over. My skin turned orange and I started using words like covfefe and bigly. My body became weak as I couldn’t even lift a glass of water or walk down a simple ramp. It’s the strangest thing.

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. i opened it up and there was porn all over. REPULTING. so much butt stuff. it made me cry. the app took 9 days to down load and once it did my phone started blowing up with pegging adds! i’m disgusted with humanity. sc: zlilyspamz ❤️ HAHAHA bye
